question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. bus
B. bus stop
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The bus stop structure (yellow pole and signage) is in the immediate foreground, while the bus is further down the road, making the bus stop clearly closer to the camera.
